title: [L2M] - Implement MAPI Integrations for ProductOrderingManagement
description:
Description
As part of LOM to M-API transition the current processing of Product ordering should be transformed to use M-APIs.
The transformation involves Inter- mapping of data models,  acquisition of additional data and thereafter invocation of various MAPI APIs. (currently only one in best case as of 08.01.25 - dd.mm.yy)
The process is captured in the attached flow.
acceptance_criteria: Instead of sending an Order via LOM-POM we are using MAPI POM

Gaps are filled within this EPIC with additional developments
